refnamediv.refpurpose: Dereference a zval pointer and return its lval element as bool

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description; #include <zend_operators.h>
zend_boolZ_BVAL_P zval *zval_p
Z_BVAL_P returns the lval element of the zval structure pointed to by zval_p casted to zend_bool.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
The lval element of the zval structure pointed to by zval_p casted to a zend_bool which is either &true; or &false;.
